After washing your hair thoroughly take 2 to 3 drops of the shampoo, equal to size of a coin, on your palm. 2. detail.message: You're sure to miss out on a significant treat if you skip using a face and body scrub in your showering routine altogether. And, so bella vita organic brings you its ayurvedic face & body scrub grit that gets rid of dull and dry looking skin to give you a soft, smooth, supple skin and all-over radiance. The 'best of all-natural ingredients' winner, it relies on coffee powder to revitalize the skin, finely ground walnut shells for the required gentle exfoliation, and himalayan rock salt to remove dead skin cells. Already a fan-favorite, it is suitable for all skin types.
